text:
@PresidencyZA In easying lockdown to lower lockdown levels,should each carry in one's heart spirit of peace,harmony, justice,productivity and prosperity in stern resistance to disastrous effects of coronavirus,with enduring hope are placed to conquer,misfortunes so far resulted.
Pançho Hajane
